DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize gene play role menstrual migraine identify use well characterise migraine population comprehensive genome-wide association scan approach . The aim study identify gene , genetic region , effect hormone expression profile woman menstrual migraine compare control population personal first-degree family history migraine . In case control study , saliva sample take 300 case 300 control DNA analysis . Blood sample 30 case 30 control take follicular phase well luteal phase menstrual cycle ribonucleic acid ( RNA ) analysis .
DOC.criteria: All case control must : Be 18 year Caucasian Provide write , inform consent Clearly understand able comply trial procedure , require Not take part trial investigational product within previous 4 week DNA Study : Cases must least 12month current past history menstrual migraine RNA Study : Cases must least 12month current history menstrual migraine Cases must keep least three month headache diary data advance visit order confirm diagnosis Controls must still menstrual period DNA Study : Cases control must smoke , chew gum consume food drink 30 minute prior sample collection RNA Study : Cases control eligible participation : Polycystic ovarian syndrome ; Taken hormone drug previous three month may affect normal hormone activity ( e.g. , hormonal contraceptive , hormone replacement therapy , dietary supplement isoflavones ) ; Donated lose significant amount blood ( > 550 mL ) within previous 12 week Additionally , control must personal family history firstdegree relative current past migraine
